name: I Think Security
tag_list: data-protection, digital-security, content-protection, security, secure-file-sharing, encryption, cloud-security
overview:
I Think Security Ltd. is a Data Protection company that focuses on providing state-of-the-art, bulletproof IT security solutions of unparalleled reliability to protect the most sensitive corporate information. The products are easy to deploy, technology agnostic and supported by sophisticated analytics and controls. The company’s activities include a unique way of providing Data Protection, Cloud Security, Mobile Security and Secure Communications.

QI, the company’s flagship product, facilitates the secure encryption & decryption of selected files & folders, independently of their location in 3 clicks. QI enables a user to share encrypted volumes with other QI users while also offering a range of value-added services including file audit trail, geo-location & massive decryption prevention. QI can be immediately deployed on top of existing infrastructures without any training or tech support. Even if your infrastructure is compromised, QI ensures your documents remain secure. QI is the key to File Security. Period.
